A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At first viewing\, you are shocked so you don't think it's good. A second viewing reveals all the layers and explanations for apparent plot holes. It's not perfect movie but mark my words\, 10 years from now\, when people will be saying it is the best Star Wars movie\, even better than Empire. The same thing happened with Empire.\nThe mark of a good movie is that it makes you feel something and stays with you even after you have left the theatre. It's been a week and I still can't get over Luke.
